Description: Up today we have a sweet Epiphone Flame Top SG made in Korea. These are no longer made so they are rare and hard to find. Especially in good condition. Guitar plays and sounds great! Built very well! For more info, please review the condition description and pics. Have any questions, feel free to ask! :) Please ask any and all questions, prior to purchasing. **Sold as is, no returns** item has been described accurately. No case or bag, but will be packaged extremely well for safe shipping. With proper shipping materials. Ships insured with tracking and signature confirmation. Please do not agree to buy if you do not plan to pay.
Title: Epiphone G-400 Deluxe Flametop SG Made in Korea 6 String Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: In good used condition. Does have a touched up scratch and a ding near the strap pin on the back. There's some minor swirl marks on the back also. There's a blemish on the side near the control plate and a few more on the bottom near the lower strap pin. There's also some pick/play wear on the pickguard. Other than that, the guitar is in good used condition. Electronics tested and working. Neck is good and straight. Frets are in great condition. Great Player!!!
